name: Greasemonkey
description: Firefox

name: Tampermonkey
description: Chrome, Safari, Opera, Firefox (also with support for mobile Dolphin Browser and UC Browser)

name: AntiAdware
description: Remove forced download accelerators, managers, and adware on supported websites.

name: Bypass Ads
description: Bypass Ads, Popups and count-down ads.

name: Direct links out
description: Removes all "You are leaving our site" and redirection stuff from links.

name: Google Images direct link
description: Adds direct links to images and pages in google image search.

name: Linkify Plus Plus
description: Turn plain text URLs into links.

name: Mouseover Popup Image Viewer
description: Shows images and videos behind links and thumbnails.

name: Select text inside a link like Opera
description: Disable link dragging and select text.

name: Show and reload broken images
description: Show and reload broken images, even when it contains "alt" tag.

name: Show Password onMouseOver
description: Show password when mouseover on password field.

name: URL Shortener Unshortener
description: Adds small button next to shortened URLs that will replace the shortened URLs with their real locations and vice-versa. Useful for when you don't want to blindly click links.

name: GitHub Comment Enhancer
description: Add features to enhance comments, wiki and contact page on GitHub.

name: GitHub Commit Whitespace
description: Adds button to hide whitespace diffs from commits.

name: GitHub Monospace Editor
description: Provide MonoSpace font on GitHub textareas.

name: GitHub PR Approvals
description: Require approvals in GitHub PRs before merging is allowed.

name: GitHub User Info
description: Show user information on avatar hover.

name: GitHub Image Viewer
description: Preview images from within the file listing.

name: Remove Google Click Tracking
description: Removes Google's click-tracking from result links.]

name: Download YouTube Videos as MP4
description: Adds a button that lets you download YouTube videos.

name: YouTube Link Title
description: Adds video titles, shows previews and embeds on click. Also supported: Vimeo, LiveLeak, Dailymotion, vidme, WorldStarHipHop, Vine, Coub, Streamable.

name: YouTube Plus
description: YouTube Plus contains all kind of different useful functions which makes your visit on YouTube much more entertaining.

name: YouTube Subtitle Download
description: Adds links to download video subtitles.

name: Greasemonkey Hacks
description: Complete wiki book on Userscripts.

name: Greasemonkey Tutorial for Beginners
description: How to create simple Userscripts and installing it using Greasemonkey.

name: Video
description: GreaseMonkey Userscript Development

name: UserScripts Mirror
description: Mirror of the original Userscripts.org repository (that is currently down).
